content.description: Slither the green stuff four feet up to the small ledge by the pine tree then walk the line directly up to the group of three pines at the top of the crag.
content.protection: Top rope off trees. Protection unknown.

content.description: Begin at the boulder that is splotched with white quartz. Climb up to the crimpy slab and finish at the “smiling” Pine tree.
content.protection: Top rope off trees. Protection unknown.

content.description: Start in an alcove on the short vertical face. Climb up slabby section, past a blueberry patch on climber’s right, and finish in the large trough.
content.protection: Top rope off trees. Protection unknown.

content.description: Start in front of the large pine tree, climb the short green slab then pass the small tree three quarters of the way up on the left hand side.  Stay left of the inverted V notch apex of the route Doin’ Time.
content.location: Start in front of large pine tree near the left side of the crag.

content.description: Same start as Walk the Line then move left and up toward the upper overhang that forms the right side of the inverted V notch. Take the overhang directly to tenuous friction on the final slab.

climbs.name: Get Busy Livin' or Get Busy Dyin'

content.description: Start in the same alcove as the beginning of Guilty as Charged on the short vertical face. Climb up several small overhangs, past a blueberry patch on climbers left, and finish just right of the trough.
content.protection: Top rope off trees. Protection unknown.

content.description: Climb the short vertical face of broken boulders to gain the easy slab to the top.  Finishes at the large pine tree to climbers right of the “smiling” pine tree.
content.protection: Top rope off trees. Protection unknown.

content.description: South facing crag minutes from Marquette.  Trad and top roping,  30-60'.
